fields.name: Guess Letter:
fields.value: Receive a random list of living players based on your score. Target half (rounded up). Name one letter. For each target, you will learn of this letter is in their role. For example, for a guess of 'E' on a player with the Sheriff role, your feedback is "[player name]: E". If This feedback stacks. If you learn multiple letters in a player's role, you will learn their distance from each other. For example, if you later guess S on this same player, your feedback is "[player name]: S _ E".

fields.name: Guess Word (3x):
fields.value: Target a player on whom you previously used Guess Letter. Guess their role. If correct, the entire town will receive a message "The hangman player has guessed the word [role name]!" This ability may be multitasked.

fields.name: Take Turns (Passive):
fields.value: You are immune to roleblocks and your defense power is doubled on odd-numbered nights.

fields.name: Hang Man (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you successfully guess two roles with Hang Man. You may attack all of them with 5.0x attack power.
